title: Jacket, from a two-piece set
description: pounded indigo jacket with stand-up collar and side opening;  five frog fasteners; 8 1/2\" side vents; 17 1/2\" x 3 1/2\" added center front panel of geometric and floral embroidery on satin; pinks, purples, reds, greens, white and black
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
